Hello David,
   
  Thanks for your reply,
  I want to run the same code but=
 with different data five times.
   
  thanks in advance,
  Mohan

saff@mit=
.edu wrote:
  Mohan,

Were you hoping to run the exact same code five times=
, or change the data each
time?  I think Cedric and I read your code two di=
fferent ways.  Thanks,

   David Saff

 <cbeust@...>:

> On 11/22/05, saff@... <saff@...> wrote:

se

re and Enjoy,

ion in JUnit 4):

() {
